text: Frank Joseph Torre (December 30, 1931 – September 13, 2014) was an American baseball player. He was first baseman in Major League Baseball. Torre who batted and threw left-handed. He played for the Milwaukee Braves (1956–60) and Philadelphia Phillies (1962–63). He was the older brother of Hall of Famer Joe Torre. Torre died in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida from cardiac arrest, aged 82. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:American baseball players Category:Milwaukee Braves players Category:Philadelphia Phillies players Category:Sportspeople from New York City
title: Frank Torre
